title: Stacey Solomon wows fans with 'real' bikini body on Maldives holiday without Joe Swash
text:

Stacey Solomon has amazed fans by showing off her "real" and "beautiful" bikini body on holiday in the Maldives holiday.

The telly star, 30, has jetted off on the sunshine break without her partner Joe Swash, 37, who has stayed behind to continue training for Dancing On Ice.

As well as her three sons, Stacey has taken her mum along and Joe is planning to fly out to meet them in a few days.

In a post on Instagram , Stacey explained: "Lots of people asking where Joe is. He's coming to meet us in a couple of days.

"He had Dancing On Ice bits to do before he could come, we can't wait fort him to get here."

Stacey shared updates from the trip, including a video showing her trying out kayaking, and a shot of her sitting on the beach with baby Rex.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The snap shows her wearing a white bikini , and holding the tot in the air.

She captioned it: "Beach babies I’m determined to get a picture of all of us while we are here but for now it’s just me, Rexy and Leighton's butt.

"The boys are having far too much fun for pictures. Feeling so lucky to spend precious time in, what I can only describe as paradise, with them making memories.

"Hurry up and get here Joe Joe we miss you."

(Image: Instagram)

The picture wowed fans, who flocked to her page to praise Stacey for sharing the snap.

One wrote: "Amazing, you look beautiful and so real."

Another commented: "You look amazing enjoy your holiday with your beautiful boys."

A third added: "You seriously are an amazing example to young mums or any mums for that matter!

"Beautiful girl with a beautiful life."

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

Joe is among the stars set to compete on the new series of ITV skating show Dancing On Ice, which is due to start in January.

Joe and Stacey welcomed their son Rex in May. Stacey is also mum to two boys from a previous relationship, while Joe also has another son with his former fiancee.
